faith_and_spirituality.title: Faith
faith_and_spirituality.description: Looking for meaning in a wasteland of cinema? These soul-searching flicks and series will have you seeing the connectivity that might unite us all, one frame at a time.

286600.title: Aleister Crowley: Legend of the Beast
286600.description: Hailed as the wickedest man alive and called the Great Beast 666 by his own mother, Aleister Crowley was also one of the most accomplished philosophers, poets, authors and sensationalists of his or any other time. A man who dared to live by his own true will.

304779.title: Joshua
304779.description: A possible second coming of Christ shakes up the rural town of Auburn in the form of a kind carpenter who seems capable of performing miracles.

304802.title: The Greatest Story Ever Told
304802.description: With an all-star cast, the life and teachings of Jesus Christ of Nazareth are retold on a grand scale in this inspiring, larger-than-life film.

355176.title: Belle And The Beast
355176.description: When Belle's father accidentally breaks a valuable work of art, Belle agrees to work for the owner in an effort to repay him.

355184.title: Overcome
355184.description: A high school kid who mistreats everyone around him has an accident that changes his life. Now he must make amends and try to become a better person.

367626.title: 2012: Doomsday
367626.description: As the date of the apocalypse nears, several strangers travel to a temple in Mexico to prevent an ancient prophecy from destroying the world.

367816.title: Sunday School Musical
367816.description: Two competing groups of high school students must rally together and enter a song and dance competition in order to save their church from closing.

368165.title: Restored Me
368165.description: An ex-con who lost his faith in God joins the crew of an old movie theater to start a new life, but soon finds the theater will test him in new ways.

372434.title: Letters to God
372434.description: After finding letters written by a boy with cancer addressed to God, a postman searching for meaning finds hope through the boy and his mother.

376140.title: Grace Unplugged
376140.description: A Christian teen runs away from home to chase her musical dreams but will she decide to take  the path of fame and fortune or faith and family?

378809.title: The Trail
378809.description: In 1848, Amelia joins a caravan headed west in pursuit of California gold. After a savage attack, she is left alone to battle hunger and the elements.

382397.title: Alone Yet Not Alone
382397.description: After being captured and transported through 300 miles of wilderness, two sisters are sustained only by their trust in God, and their hope of escape.

386233.title: Fake Preacher
386233.description: A Harlem con man pretends to be a preacher in order to steal money from the congregation. As conflicts develop, he seeks a way to redeem himself.

386241.title: Basketball 3:16
386241.description: As a young man grows up and allows God into his life, he begins to see Him in every aspect of his life — even on the basketball court.

391669.title: Sunday Morning Rapture
391669.description: As a group of churchgoers struggles with their every day troubles and vices, they come to discover that they aren't ready to face the rapture.

392048.title: Book of Songs
392048.description: A down on his luck musician is antagonistic to the churchgoers next door until he is introduced to the bible through music, leading to an epiphany.

436689.title: God's Compass
436689.description: A woman retires and is faced with a wave of problems that turn into blessings as she puts her trust in God’s path and takes in a young delinquent.

445085.title: Time Changer
445085.description: A Bible scholar living in 1890 climbs aboard a time machine to see how the book he wrote will affect future generations and is stunned by the results.

445090.title: Princess Cut
445090.description: A southern farm girl dreaming of a Princess Cut ring for love has her hopes crash around her until her Dad helps her learn about true love for others.

445535.title: The Scroll: Revelations
445535.description: THE SCROLL: Revelations is the natural progression of one of the most transcending documentaries ever created. It delves into the spiritual relevance of todays day and age at even furher levels. A feature length film created to help inspire everyday people through real life parables and narrations from recognizable spiritual figureheads. Presented as a series of short vignettes recorded in an intimate, close-cropped setting to engage the viewer as if he or she is soul seeking wisdom at the foot of a sage. Weaving the journey and anecdotes of some of the most prolific high profile ministers, evangelists and church leaders of the 21st Century, The Scroll took three years to complete, interviewing over 50 of the U.S.'s most progressive and revered Spiritual Leaders.

447776.title: 7 Signs of Christ's Return
447776.description: Can Biblical prophecy predict the future? Here are seven momentous world events that could herald the second coming of Jesus Christ.

448280.title: Remember the Goal
448280.description: An inspirational coach takes over the cross-country program at a Christian school, where her runners confront the dilemmas of teenage life.

448666.title: Lion of Judah
448666.description: A brave and gentle lamb and his barnyard pals travel to Jerusalem to save a friend’s life, their bold journey mirroring the hopeful story of Jesus.

448669.title: Dog Jack
448669.description: This historic tale tracks a slave boy and his dog, as they escape, join the Union army, and face their former master in a showdown on the battlefield.

453779.title: Chonda Pierce: Laughing in the Dark
453779.description: The Christian comedian bares all in this documentary, revealing her struggles with depression and loss, and how her faith has kept her together.

461873.title: The Witnessing of Angels
461873.description: In this documentary, people tell breathtaking eyewitness accounts of how they have seen and heard angels, and its impact on their religious beliefs.

464287.title: Forgiveness
464287.description: A beloved Pastor works to serve his 'flock' and save his church. In his dedication and desire to do so, he crosses uncrossable boundaries.

464387.title: The Colors of Emily
464387.description: Kate Montgomery, an artist/art buyer, is searching for something missing in her life. However, when she discovers blind artist, Emily Burton, she's forced to re-examine her own twisted past - one painting at a time.

464399.title: God's Club
464399.description: Welcome to God’s Club: the inspirational story that explores the union of education and faith.

464401.title: Christmas Miracle
464401.description: Eight strangers are forced to take refuge in an abandoned church during a storm and learn, by working together, miracles can happen.

465472.title: Mountain Top
465472.description: A former lawyer returns to the courtroom to defend an eccentric old man, whose visions could reveal the truth about their small Appalachian town.

465475.title: The Fourth Wiseman
465475.description: The fictional story traces the journey of a defiant young magus who sets out on his own and takes a circuitous 33-year path to give his gift to Jesus.

465477.title: End of the Harvest
465477.description: A Christian college student, unable to prove the existence of God to a philosophy club, makes plans to get even against the atheists.

465478.title: The Perfect Gift
465478.description: A spoiled girl and a disillusioned minister discover the true meaning of Christmas from a friendly, but mysterious, drifter in this faith-based drama.

466001.title: Faith’s Song
466001.description: A young girl’s faith is tested after her parents die in a car accident and she is placed in new surroundings with relatives who are non-believers.

466280.title: Steps of Faith
466280.description: A tenacious city girl, struggling to find her place in the world, shocks her family by moving to the countryside to work on a farm.

466290.title: Seven Days Away
466290.description: A man’s recent commitment to God is tested when he takes a vacation with his friends and is kidnapped, abused and held for ransom.

466307.title: Elizabeth’s Gift
466307.description: After the tragic death of their young daughter, a grieving couple are guided by their faith to a homeless girl in need of a miracle.

466312.title: Undeserved
466312.description: A courageous pastor searches the streets for her troubled niece, who has become easy prey for a sweet-talking hustler after running away from home.

466545.title: Man From Earth: Holocene
466545.description: A 14,000-year-old teacher, who hides in plain sight, fears for his life and the fate of mankind when four students unearth his powerful secret.

466735.title: Tortured for Christ
466735.description: One pastor dares to stand up against the Soviet Union's ban on religion, enduring torture and solitary confinement for his beliefs in this true story.

466780.title: The 5th Quarter
466780.description: A teen proves his late brother’s legacy after a tragic car crash by wearing his old jersey and leading his school football team to historic victory.

467588.title: The Man From Earth
467588.description: When colleagues throw a farewell bash for a retiring professor, the scholar reveals that he's had a stranger and far, far longer past than they knew.

468043.title: Healed by Grace
468043.description: A world-class dancer is brought to a standstill in a horrific accident, but therapy with a mare brings her both grace and new beginnings.

468776.title: King's Faith
468776.description: A streetwise teenager enrolls in a suburban high school where he finds support from a group of believers. But not everyone can look beyond his past.

470106.title: A Matter of Faith
470106.description: A Christian college student finds herself in a crisis of faith when her father finds her biology professor teaches evolution as the answer of life.

470581.title: Pastor Jones: Help Save My Daughter
470581.description: While battling her mother’s untrustworthy live-in boyfriend, 16-year-old Noelle finds herself caught in a web of lies, deceit and betrayal.

470755.title: Set Free
470755.description: After her husband's death, an old secret ignites a rippling effect, forcing Danielle to realize that truth is the only thing that will set her free.

471240.title: The Golden Voices
471240.description: To save her grandmother's job, a woman is challenged with putting together a choir in one month, and hires a fallen, bad boy, R&B singer, to help.

472173.title: Paul the Apostle
472173.description: Beautifully filmed in the Moroccan desert, the biblical saga of Paul the Apostle is told as he brings Christ’s Gospel to the Western world.

474347.title: Divination
474347.description: A couple who are expecting their first child are ecstatic but, when the husband is tormented by horrific visions, a spiritual battle begins.

480305.title: Ragamuffin
480305.description: An insecure musical genius, raised in a turbulent environment, trades fame and fortune in the Christian music scene for life on an Indian reservation.

485951.title: Priceless
485951.description: After the death of his family, a man struggles to find steady work and agrees to drive a box truck on a one-time trip cross country for cash — no questions asked — but when he discovers what he is delivering, he is faced with a life-changing choice.

486073.title: Where Was God?
486073.description: This story follows several families and individuals who recount the timeline of destruction wrought by the May 2013, EF5 tornado that ripped through Moore, OK. These are their stories of hope after the storm.

486618.title: Lifted
486618.description: An Alabama middle school student prepares for a singing competition while dealing with heavy family problems, and relentless school bullies.

486937.title: Bible Collection: Genesis
486937.description: Experience the epic tale of creation in this Christian anthology that details the stories of Adam and Eve, Cain and Abel, and Noah and the Ark.

486938.title: Bible Collection: Esther
486938.description: Following the conquest of Babylon, the Biblical tale of Ahasuerus, Vashti, and Esther comes alive with this inspiring story of hope, mercy, and faith.

487375.title: Bible Collection: Solomon
487375.description: Experience the epic story of King Solomon of Israel, the beautiful Queen of Sheba, and a kingdom under threat of collapse in this biblical tale.

489419.title: Heavenly Deposit
489419.description: A modern-day Atlas bearing the weight of the world comes face-to-face with the existence of God.

489500.title: Heaven’s Door
489500.description: A girl mourning the loss of her grandparents and suffering from her parents’ divorce finds a portal to Heaven and is granted miraculous powers.

493734.title: Crossroads
493734.description: The life of a young Jesuit seminarian turns upside down when he falls in love with a beautiful volunteer, while working at a Gulf Coast soup kitchen.

497135.title: Divine Will
497135.description: Will Blessing and his uncle Dave grace the town of Punkyville, Kentucky with their gifts of music, faith, and a renewed sense of hope.

497343.title: End of the Trail
497343.description: The three surviving sons of a beloved father reunite after years apart to scatter his ashes in the mountains and see if they can salvage their family.

498178.title: The Inquiry
498178.description: In 35 AD, the Roman emperor sends a warrior to visit Jerusalem to investigate the death and disprove the rumored resurrection of Jesus of Nazareth.

498496.title: Free Indeed: The Phil Thatcher Story
498496.description: How one of California’s most notorious criminals during the 1920s and 1930s was reformed after meeting Jesus Christ in his Folsom prison cell.

498497.title: A Nation Adrift
498497.description: From the founding of America to the Civil War to FDR to the present, learn how the entirety of United States history is owed to the work of God.

500738.title: Patterns of Evidence: Exodus
500738.description: An in-depth historical and archaeological investigation into the validity of the Exodus from Egypt using Biblical text against artifactual evidence.

501187.title: Joseph: Beloved Son, Rejected Slave, Exalted Ruler
501187.description: Biblical animated feature about Joseph, favored by his father and sold into slavery by his brothers, and how he became a faithful, forgiving ruler.

502766.title: Caught
502766.description: A young man searches for the father he never met in Amsterdam, where he begins a downward spiral of drugs and crime, until he meets a caring stranger.

502790.title: 7 Days in the Holy Land
502790.description: Franklin Graham and his daughter Cissie travel to the land of the Bible. As they read God's Word in Israel, they delight in Jesus’ teachings.

504740.title: Edge of Salvation
504740.description: A documentarian follows a struggling family with an adopted son through the recession, as they rapidly descend down the socio-economic ladder.

507867.title: The Pilgrim's Progress
507867.description: Animated tale of a man obsessed with finding truth and escaping a city’s destruction who encounters hardships, foes and victory in his faith journey.

510061.title: The Good Journey
510061.description: Estranged brothers sent on a cross country journey by their father attempt to find common ground while offering gratitude and forgiveness to others.

514719.title: China Cry
514719.description: Set in the 1950s, this is the story of Sung Neng Yee, a Chinese Christian, who is subjected to persecution after the Japanese seize her house.

521603.title: WWJD? What Would Jesus Do?
521603.description: Film adaptation of the hit book that tells the stories of individual Americans making decisions with the vow to walk in the thoughtful steps of Jesus.

522129.title: Thy Will Be Done
522129.description: After surviving a near death experience and losing his faith, an ex-pastor mysteriously awakens in a church that is in desperate need of help.

522201.title: Heritage Falls
522201.description: A basketball coach tries to mold his bookworm son and dropout grandson by taking them to a rustic cabin for three adventurous, soul-searching days.

522510.title: Saved by Grace
522510.description: A retired cop, despondent over the loss of his family, meets a mysterious woman, who gives him a reason to re-examine what he truly values in life.

525166.title: Seven Days in Utopia
525166.description: After a disastrous debut on the pro circuit, a young golfer finds himself stranded in Utopia, Texas and welcomed by an eccentric, but caring rancher.

525190.title: Polycarp
525190.description: A slave girl adopted by Christians in the 2nd century learns their faith by a friendly bishop, but the Romans demand Caesar be worshipped as a lord.

525193.title: A Distant Thunder
525193.description: A female fugitive is relentlessly chased by an anti-Christ group of operatives during the end of days and given a choice to join them or be killed.

526131.title: The Life of Jesus
526131.description: The life of Jesus is recounted from the perspective of one of his apostles, according to the Gospel of John,  and narrated by Christopher Plummer.

526134.title: A Thief in the Night
526134.description: A terrifying tale of the rapture follows a faithless young woman who wakes up one morning amidst the horrific, earth-shaking events of the end times.

527147.title: My Name Is Thomas
527147.description: When an older man goes to the Spanish desert on his Harley for quiet reflection, he meets a young woman whose disruptive antics can't hide her heart.

528415.title: Saved by Faith
528415.description: An inspirational faith-based documentary telling real stories of life and death situations where divine providence miraculously saved a life.

528418.title: Ruling of the Heart
528418.description: During a violent storm, a tough judge who rules fast and hard finds himself stuck in a cafe with some of the people who suffered his harsh verdicts.

531766.title: The Journey From Unbelief to Faith
531766.description: The lives of four strangers from different backgrounds and belief systems intersect in faith as each comes to accept Jesus as their Lord and Savior.

532058.title: The Mormons
532058.description: A Mormon Bible study explores the differences in the teachings of their faith, rituals, and house of worship and those of Orthodox Christians.

539276.title: 94 Feet
539276.description: A town built around its mining industry is on the brink of economic ruin. Until a tragedy brings the faith-based community back together.

542062.title: Hands Up
542062.description: Two young men, a war veteran and a cop, are on a dramatic collision course despite their good intentions to help an underprivileged community.

542295.title: The Passion: Live
542295.description: A cast of popular musicians share the story of Jesus coming to earth in human form as a giver of salvation and sacrificing himself for eternal good.

543219.title: God's Outlaw
543219.description: The story of William Tyndale, who bravely dedicated his life to translating the Bible into English, and publishing it for everyday people.

543223.title: The Cross and the Switchblade
543223.description: When Reverend David Wilkerson meets Nicky, a juvenile delinquent who’s deeply involved with an NYC gang, he hopes to encourage the young man.

544463.title: Torchlighters: The Corrie Ten Boom Story
544463.description: The true story of a brave Dutch Christian watchmaker who risked her life to protect Jews from the Nazi regime during World War II.

550864.title: The Passion of the Christ
550864.description: The brutal portrayal of the final hours in the life of Jesus, as he is betrayed by Judas, condemned to death, tortured, and yet performs one last act of grace.

552854.title: Healing River
552854.description: Following a family tragedy caused by a drug-addicted teen, one woman’s grief is turned into a desire for revenge, as her Christian faith is tested.

553155.title: Breaking the Press
553155.description: In Texas, where life revolves around high school sports, the adopted son of a basketball coach accepts an offer to play for another school’s team.

555101.title: Promises to Keep
555101.description: A devout man crosses paths with a former love he prayed would return to her faith. Will his love be enough to change her heart?

555383.title: The Heart of Man
555383.description: An honest telling of the personal costs of breaking promises and following lust, as well as God’s redemptive journey back into hope.

555594.title: Soldier of Destiny
555594.description: After his life is saved by a fellow soldier, a young marine must journey to Ethiopia to rescue his fallen comrade’s sister from guerilla fighters.

560150.title: Esau and the Palestinians
560150.description: Trace the biblical roots of the Palestinians back to the Rose Red City of Petra and Esau, the twin brother of Jacob and progenitor of the Edomites.

560227.title: Russ Taff: I Still Believe
560227.description: The award-winning Christian music icon shares his story of freedom from alcoholism and childhood abuse that kept him in a prison of private shame.

560760.title: Unexpected Places
560760.description: The story of a modern-day prodigal son and a family in need of mending is told in the words of the Bible, particularly The Gospel According to Mark

562031.title: Jerusalem: City Between Religions - Sites of the World's Cultures
562031.description: The Holy City holds significance for Jews, Christians, and Muslims. This doc examines the religions’ separate claims that Jerusalem belongs to them.

566545.title: Golden Mind
566545.description: A poor young man falls for a wealthy classmate. While others assume their love can’t last, he’s attracted to her heart and strong faith.

568666.title: Finding Jesus
568666.description: Animated faith-filled stories and inspirational kindness shared by the community of a beautiful bay where kids learn about the Bible in fun new ways.

573727.title: The Perfect Race
573727.description: In this sequel to “Remember the Goal” a faith-based, supportive athletic coach helps an athlete at a Christian college work to win an 800-meter race.

578340.title: Samuel: The Last of the Judges
578340.description: This one-hour biblical drama recounts the thrilling story of the Old Testament prophet, Samuel.æ

580960.title: It’s a Life Worth Living
580960.description: A man haunted by a bad start in life struggles with drug addiction and relationships but, in his darkest hour, God and his friends show him the way.

581015.title: Early Warning
581015.description: A devout Christian woman tries to warn others that the end times are coming and an evil organization is conspiring to control the entire world.

583950.title: Walk by Faith: After the Honeymoon
583950.description: In this faith-based tale, newlyweds struggling to adjust to wedlock cross paths with an older pair, considering divorce after many years of marriage.

595568.title: The Gospel According to Matthew
595568.description: This Biblical drama follows the life of Jesus Christ as depicted in the Gospel of Matthew from the New Testament.

596628.title: The Star of Bethlehem
596628.description: This documentary centers on the rare and historical star that was said to have appeared in the sky during the birth of Jesus of Nazareth.

602257.title: The Second Coming of Christ
602257.description: During The Rapture, a woman scientist comes to the end of her journey at the end of times and discovers that true faith can produce miracles.

605789.title: Translated
605789.description: An old man about to be executed in ancient Rome arrives in the present, where he is confused and homeless, but insistent that he is the Apostle Paul.

609347.title: To Hell and Back
609347.description: Based on the Biblical story of Job, this modern take centers around a land developer who finds his business and personal life falling apart.

609358.title: Sins of the Father
609358.description: After a pastor’s wife is brutally murdered, secrets and scandals become increasingly transparent, leading to one shocking revelation.

613482.title: The Case for Faith
613482.description: Join investigative reporter Lee Strobel, as he explores the eight "heart barriers" to Christianity, along with the most common emotional arguments.

613486.title: The Case for Christ
613486.description: The true story of a cynical reporter who researches Christianity and goes from a passionate atheist to someone with unshakable faith.

613490.title: King of Creation
613490.description: This Christian program embraces the powerful meditations that celebrate the awe-inspiring creations that showcase God’s amazing vision.

614250.title: The Gift of Jabez
614250.description: The New York Times bestseller inspired countless people by revealing the power of a simple prayer. This documentary further explores its roots.

614494.title: Quest for the Real Paul: An Apostle of Jesus Christ
614494.description: Take an extraordinary adventure with Paul, an Apostle of Jesus, as his most important teachings are brought into a modern context.

614687.title: Church People
614687.description: A youth pastor finds himself between a rock and a hard place when his focus on the Gospel clashes with the higher-ups and a blasphemous Eastern stunt.

614976.title: If You're Gone
614976.description: When a high school senior vanishes on the night of graduation, his girlfriend is forced to question everything she thought she knew about them both.

616019.title: The Man Who Went to Heaven
616019.description: After being fatally shot in by a robber, David Burrows returns from the dead with a story about his afterlife experience.

619849.title: No Way Home: Homeless in America
619849.description: Witness the amazing work of former NFL Super Bowl Champion turned Pastor Timothy Johnson, as he helps Florida’s homeless population.

620612.title: Pass the Light
620612.description: Disturbed by the hateful platform of a popular congressional candidate running in his district, a high school decides to launch an underdog challenge.

622247.title: Let There Be Light
622247.description: A famous atheist still mourning a death in his family suffers a tragedy that leaves him clinically dead, forever changing his views on God.

622272.title: Lockdown: 2025
622272.description: When a highly contagious virus puts the entire country on lockdown, enforced by martial law, one family learns they’re not safe in their own home.

623557.title: Blanco
623557.description: Based on true events, a young Latino’s story unfolds, as his chosen life in the fast lane crashes head-on with its consequences and tests his faith.

624321.title: Finding Jesus 2
624321.description: Muggles and Joy are two faithful friends who enjoy learning about Jesus’ endless love and kindness while spreading His word for peace in the world.

627116.title: Pope John Paul II's Vatican
627116.description: A rare look inside the world's most visited and smallest sovereign nation during the quarter-of-a-century reign of Supreme Pontiff Pope John Paul II.

629903.title: Fatima: A Message of Hope
629903.description: This doc examines the prophetic revelations and miracles that are said to have occurred in Fatima, with insights on why this story is still relevant.

632870.title: Bible Secrets: The Forbidden Codes
632870.description: Unlocks the profound mysteries and sacred codes of the most important literary work in human history that they never taught you in Sunday school.

634430.title: The Healer
634430.description: With the help of a teenage girl with terminal cancer, Alec Bailey learns to embrace and put to use his family’s mysterious gift of healing people.

634436.title: Root of the Problem
634436.description: A real-life money tree finds its way into the Campbell Family and takes them on a whirlwind journey that threatens to lead to tragic consequences.

636017.title: Without Grace
636017.description: After a tragedy causes a man to question his faith, his friends try to help him in a series of events, doing more harm than good, until love steps in.

637727.title: A Father’s Fight
637727.description: An aging boxer hits his own personal rock bottom before his competition with himself inspires a comeback so he can fight for his life’s purpose.

646163.title: CainAbel
646163.description: In a modern version of a biblical tale, a father’s recklessness tears his family apart, igniting a deadly battle of good versus evil between his sons.

646290.title: Christian Mingle
646290.description: When a marketing exec looks for Mr. Right on a Christian dating app, and her efforts to impress him fail, she gets in touch with her spiritual side.

647029.title: Proverbs 31
647029.description: After two marriages are put in extremely strenuous situations, loyalty is challenged as well as four individuals’ relationships with God.

647777.title: Full Count
647777.description: A young baseball player is forced to abandon his college baseball to deal with a tragedy that puts the fate of his family and their farm in jeopardy.

649961.title: Greater
649961.description: The true story of Arkansas Razorbacks offensive lineman Brandon Burlsworth, who defied expectations to become an All-American football player.

653867.title: Faith, Hope & Love
653867.description: A romantic comedy about a driven and recently divorced woman who falls in love just when she has to save what she built for her future.

653976.title: Survival
653976.description: A family gets stranded in the high desert, in 1975 before cell phones, and have to fight to survive the wild after their small plane crashes.

660500.title: And You Call Yourself a Christian
660500.description: A Christian woman watches her newfound faith tested after a tragedy destroys her life. Will she be able to work through her doubts and fears?

660813.title: The Bible Collection: The Apocalypse
660813.description: The BIble tells of John's visions during a time of severe persecution for Christians that led to major revelations about God’s plans.

661873.title: David v Goliath: Battle of Faith
661873.description: Loosely based on the biblical tale comes this story of a simple shepherd, who transforms into a powerful warrior and takes on a terrifying giant.

663043.title: Genesis with Max McLean
663043.description: Through humorous and insightful narration, Max McLean tells the story of the Book of Genesis, from the flood of Noah to Abraham's sacrifice.

665447.title: Break Every Chain
665447.description: Faced with the threat of losing his family and his job as a police officer, a depressed man turns to faith to find hope and redemption.

666240.title: Everyday Miracles
666240.description: To escape his evangelist homelife, a reluctant faith healer finds refuge working as a ranch hand for a widower until his past catches up with him.

670339.title: I Believe
670339.description: After coming across a bible verse outside of a church, a 9 year old boy finds supernatural power behind God's message in the form of miracles.

673334.title: Upon This Rock
673334.description: An examination of monastery life around a 130-foot rock outcrop upon which a monk hopes to live and become the first stylite there in 600 years.

673921.title: Set Free Posse: Jesus Freaks, Biker Gang, or Christian Cult?
673921.description: This film looks into Set Free Church, considered a cult by many, and the people who have experienced a life-changing faith following its message.

675077.title: Signed, Sealed & Delivered
675077.description: After serving 10 years of a 30-year prison sentence for attempted murder and other crimes, King-Pin Mack Biggs is out and ready to share the gospel.

675664.title: Faith
675664.description: A devout evangelical Christian faces a crisis of faith after a sudden and unexpected tragedy.

676205.title: 12 Days With God
676205.description: As a man undergoes two major surgeries to remove a cancerous growth behind his eye, complications arise and he puts his trust in God for a miracle.

680212.title: Fishes 'N Loaves: Heaven Sent
680212.description: A California pastor is reassigned to a church in a small Arizona town, where he and his family learn that country living takes some getting used to.

682423.title: Eighteen
682423.description: As the clock winds down toward his 18th birthday, Percy contemplates his limited options before his father plans to kick him out of the house.

683036.title: A Time for Heaven
683036.description: Inspired by the incredible true story of a tenacious nurse helping people at the end of their lives who is assigned an unexpected new patient.

683760.title: Message and the Messenger
683760.description: Jessica Clark, like many members of her church, is being taken advantage of by her pastor—until God sends a message through an unlikely messenger.

689927.title: The Good Catholic
689927.description: A small-town priest is torn between his commitment to his job and his newfound love for a dying woman he met in the confessional booth.

693679.title: Once Upon a Lifetime
693679.description: Faith, family and magic converge when a little boy and his struggling family are transformed by a special young girl who teaches them about love.

696706.title: Gold Through the Fire
696706.description: A 17-year-old Russian Christian performs a daring escape to America to get away from the religious persecution of the Soviet Union.

696718.title: The Girl Who Believes in Miracles
696718.description: Young Sara discovers her prayers have the power to heal but soon learns the cost may be too high. Can her family save her before it’s too late?

697746.title: Sons of God: Fallen Angels Explored
697746.description: Who were the sons of God, as noted in Genesis 6? A group of Biblical scholars and Church leaders explores diverse theories on these mysterious beings.

700076.title: Nun Nancy
700076.description: A passionate minister disguises herself as a bartender at a Baltimore watering hole so she can more effectively share God’s love with the clientele.

700377.title: Never Ashamed
700377.description: A juvenile delinquent starts reading the Bible after attending a Christian get-together, but faces ridicule over his transformation.

703256.title: Witness to Hope: The Life of John Paul II
703256.description: A complete and intimate portrait of the late Pope John Paul II, one of the world’s greatest proponents of religious freedom and human rights.

703565.title: A 2nd Chance
703565.description: A story about a young man named Adam, whose mission is to protect and advise a bullied social misfit in order to earn a passage to Heaven.

707377.title: Me Again
707377.description: Things don't go as planned when a disenchanted pastor wishes for a different life and comes to realize the grass isn’t necessarily greener.

707428.title: Book of Daniel
707428.description: Facing certain death, a man enslaved after the fall of Jerusalem proves himself a trusted advisor and is placed among King Nebuchadnezzar’s wise men.

708092.title: Church of Darkness
708092.description: A devout Christian teen boy moves to a new town and discovers a sinister underground society flourishing under the mayor's protection.

708188.title: The Book of Ruth: Journey of Faith
708188.description: Powerful themes of tolerance gained through love shine in this production of the Moabite widow who produces a son with her new Israelite husband.

708192.title: The Book of Esther
708192.description: A Jewish girl is chosen as the new queen consort to King Xerxes of Persia. Will she be able to stop evil Lord Haman's plot to exterminate her people?

708929.title: Saving Winston
708929.description: When a troubled teen is forced to leave a self-destructive lifestyle, she discovers an abandoned horse along her journey to improvement.

709111.title: Inside Bob Dylan's Jesus Years: Busy Being Born Again!
709111.description: An insider's view into his "Born Again" transformation with rare photos, unearthed interviews, and exclusive live concert footage from 1978-1981.

710961.title: Apostle Peter and the Last Supper
710961.description: Three days before his execution, the elderly Apostle Peter recounts to his jailer his time with Jesus in the hours leading up to his crucifixion.

712842.title: Revelation Road: The Beginning of the End
712842.description: A traveling salesman with a dark past must fight demons, both his own and a murderous biker gang, in his quest to complete his last sale and go home.

712845.title: Meant to Be
712845.description: Questioning his purpose in life, a young man sets out to find his birth mother and discovers God's plan for him.

715453.title: Mr. Wrong
715453.description: All seems lost for a woman as she chases after a charismatic bad boy, until her faith in the Lord gives her the power to make a wise decision.

715890.title: The Encounter
715890.description: A road closure forces five strangers to come together at a remote roadside eatery whose omniscient owner may be Jesus Christ.

715900.title: The Encounter: Paradise Lost
715900.description: Seven years after the most devastating tsunami in Thailand, six strangers find themselves trapped in a beach resort on the brink of a hurricane.

722747.title: Son of a Preacher Man
722747.description: A promising young executive falls in love with a gambler who ultimately ruins her career. While he looks for redemption, she’s forced to start over.

726050.title: The Unseen Realm
726050.description: This fascinating documentary casts a light on the strange and enigmatic plane of the supernatural that lies within the pages of Scripture.

100000057.title: Somebody's Child
100000057.description: A chance meeting between an ex-con and the twin brother he never knew he had brings long overdue reconciliation and redemption to one special family.

100000178.title: Mysterious Ways
100000178.description: After losing her son in a hit-and-run, a chance encounter with an unhomed man helps lift Marilyn out of her fog of grief and heal her emotional scars.

100000352.title: Once Upon a Time in Mongolia
100000352.description: After her mom dies, Mya discovers an old photograph that sets her on a journey to find her long-lost father in the exotic deserts of Mongolia.

100000587.title: Fireproof
100000587.description: This story follows one man's desire to transform his life and marriage through the healing power of faith and fully embrace the fireman's code.

100000764.title: God's Not Here
100000764.description: The first-ever faith-based anthology film featuring four unique stories about forgiveness, love, hope and belief in what you can’t see.

100000998.title: Unlocking the Soul
100000998.description: This self-help documentary explores the findings and conclusions of the past century's five most credible and prolific spiritual experts.

100001345.title: Faith Under Fire
100001345.description: After losing his wife to cancer, a firefighter watches his daughter struggle with the same disease while a kind pastor helps him rediscover his faith.

100001655.title: Ancestors: Old Testament
100001655.description: Take a closer look at the heroes, villains, and everyday folks from the Old Testament in this animated film with a cheeky sense of humor.

100002116.title: Salvage Yard Shine Boys
100002116.description: Once torn apart by jealousy, two brothers reunite in the face of danger, testing their faith and bringing about some unexpected revelations.

100002267.title: The Bible Is a Trilogy
100002267.description: This film takes a look at the Bible through a modern lens, exploring the Lost Books and searching for evidence of God all around us.

0300007679.title: The Chosen
0300007679.description: Witness the life of Christ through the ordinary people who connected with him through miracles and everyday interactions that changed the world.

0300006947.title: Highway to Heaven
0300006947.description: In this compelling drama-fantasy, a probationary angel joins a former police officer to help people with their dilemmas and challenges.

0300005343.title: Drive Thru History: The Gospels
0300005343.description: A faith-based travel show teaching the story of Jesus by visiting 50 ancient sites in Israel recorded in the Gospels of Matthew, Mark, Luke and John.

03505.title: Jesus of Nazareth
03505.description: Acclaimed director Franco Zeffirelli and an all-star cast come together to deliver a powerful adaptation of the Gospels in 1977's Jesus Of Nazareth. From the Nativity to the Crucifixion and Resurrection, the life of Jesus is presented with stunning depth, gravity, and emotion.
